page.title: 03 MOOREDGE FARM.
page.content: Mooredge farm has been here since 1920 and the people that work the farm now are Mr.and Mrs. Davidson.The man who owns the farm is a man called Eric Watson. They keep sheep and bullocks and grow Barley and grain because these are the most profitable.They have lived here for the past 8 years and the only changes they made is to have the farm painted. Mrs Davidson said that she had heard that there may be a motor-way running through them.She says if this happens she will move back to the Cheviots.She would not like to move as she likes the area but she could not take to a main road running so near to her farm.She likes the farm because it is healthy for the children but machinery can be dangerous.
